channel.title: Edward Snowden: Here's how we take back the internet
channel.description:
[center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yVwAodrjZMY[/youtube][/center]
Opinions?
(If the Youtube thing does not work above click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yVwAodrjZMY]Here[/url])
Is he doing good or is he doing bad?
NSA responds [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zLNXIXingyU]Here[/url]

item.title: Edward Snowden: Here's how we take back the internet
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:4, topic:541460”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=660330.msg4415238#msg4415238 date=1395590304]
edward snowden is a traitor and has the blood of american citizens on his hands
[/quote]As much as he’s trolling, this is sort of true (I don’t know exactly what he released, but there must have been strategy/technology related content in his leaks too - key military information).[/quote]

Agreed. He’s a bit of a liability and now he’s in Russia. It’s believed that he also has the war plans for the US. He’s a traitor as a far as I’m concerned but admittedly, I don’t know too much about the situation. I know when he exposed the the Australian spying of Indonesia it caused a little bit of trouble. It wasn’t necessary. All countries spy on each other and I’m glad they do. I want to be safe.

As for the domestic spying… well, we all knew about that beforehand. It doesn’t really worry me.

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:5, topic:541460”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=660330.msg4415245#msg4415245 date=1395596479]

edward snowden is a traitor and has the blood of american citizens on his hands
[/quote]As much as he’s trolling, this is sort of true (I don’t know exactly what he released, but there must have been strategy/technology related content in his leaks too - key military information).

So sad, US troops get killed in their illegal invasion of other countries.[/quote]

It’s still US troops. It’s still people.

Read full topic
item.source: Edward Snowden: Here's how we take back the internet
